Package game

Class EstusFlask

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
game.EstusFlask
All Implemented Interfaces:
DesignOSoulsAddOn, Capable, Printable, Consumable, Resettable
public class EstusFlask
extends Item
implements Resettable, Consumable
Item that allows the player to refill health. Has a finite number of uses.
